title: Great Sage
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine
description: Great Sage specializes in global vegan cuisine in a simple zen-like atmosphere. Happy hour is Tuesday to Friday from 3-6pm. Live music and drink specials on Thursday night (open til 10:30pm). Sunday brunch is from 10am-3pm. It's part of the Conscious Corner family of local, independently owned businesses also within the same shopping center: Nest (clothing and gift boutique), Bark (natural pet food and supplies), and Roots Market.
